header.title: Lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso OHS
intro.title: Polokeho ea Kaho
intro.description: Netefatsa ho latela melao ea polokeho ea kaho ka lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso OHS. Lisebelisoa tsa rona li thusa ho laola kotsi, ho latela melao, le ho sireletsa basebetsi setšeng, ka ho sebelisa mekhoa e metle e hlalositsoeng ho *Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans*.
intro.download_link: Khoasolla Moralo oa OHS oa Kaho: Tobetsa Mona
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikarabello ba Moreki
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi ea Motheo (BRA) e hlalosang likotsi tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhaloso ea Polokeho le Bophelo e hlalosang litlhoko tse khethehileng tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(l): Amohela Moralo oa Polokeho le Bophelo oa Mokonteraka pele mosebetsi o qala.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikarabello ba Mokonteraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(a): Hlahisa Moralo oa Polokeho le Bophelo o thehiloeng ho tlhaloso ea moreki.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ea Polokeho le Bophelo setšeng e nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Molao oa Kaho 9: Etsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi le ho Hlahloba Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokhoa o khethehileng bakeng sa mosebetsi.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikarabello ba Setsebi sa H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Molao oa Kaho 5(5): Baemeli (PrCHSA) ba laola H&S lebitsong la moreki, ba netefatsa ho latela melao.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Molao oa Kaho 8(5): Baofisiri (CHSO) ba thusa bakonteraka ho kenya ts'ebetsong le ho hlahloba litsamaiso tsa H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Melao ea SACPCMP: Ba tlameha ho boloka ngoliso le litlhoko tsa CPD bakeng sa maemo a setsebi.

cart.title: Selikalikoe sa Hao
cart.invoice_reference: Nomoro ea Reference ea Invoice: (E sebetsa matsatsi a 7. Ngolisa ho e boloka ka ho sa feleng!)
resources.title: Ikopanye le Litsebi tsa H&S tse Amoheloang
resources.description: Na u hloka thuso ea litsebi? Ikopanye le litsebi tse amoheloang bakeng sa litlhoko tsa morero oa hau.

chatbot.response: Ke mona ho u thusa! Bakeng sa likeletso tse qaqileng tsa OHS, ka kopo kopana le setsebi.
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Ho Latela Molao oa OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Qala ka ho khetha tšebeletso ho netefatsa ho latela Molao oa Bophelo le Polokeho Mosebetsing.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Ntlha ea Boqapi: Na u tseba hore litokomane tsa OHS tse nepahetseng li ka fokotsa liketsahalo mosebetsing ka ho fihla ho 30%? Ha re qaleng!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_1.description: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(b) o hloka Tlhaloso ea Polokeho le Bophelo bakeng sa merero eohle, ha 7(1)(b) e hloka Faele ea H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Ntlha ea Boqapi: Tlhaloso ea H&S e tiileng e ka fokotsa likotsi ka 30%! E joaloka lebota la polokeho la morero oa hau.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_2.description: Molao oa Kaho 5: Bareki ba tlameha ho fana ka Tlhaloso ea Polokeho le Bophelo le ho netefatsa hore bakonteraka ba latela molao.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Bareki ba bolokang ngoliso ea COIDA ba ka qoba litefiso tse boima—boloka nomoro eo haufi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_3.description: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(a): Bakonteraka ba tlameha ho hlahisa Moralo oa Polokeho le Bophelo o thehiloeng ho tlhaloso ea moreki.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Ho thonya mokonteraka kapele ho ka potlakisa ho latela molao—mosebetsi oa sehlopha o etsa hore toro ea polokeho e sebetse!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_4.description: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(b): Bakonteraka ba tlameha ho boloka Faele ea Polokeho le Bophelo setšeng e nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Ho ba le lintlha tsa ho ikopanya tsa mokonteraka tse loketseng ho ka boloka letsatsi nakong ea tšohanyetso—lula u ikopanye!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_5.description: Molao oa Kaho 3(1): Pheprmiti ea hlokahala bakeng sa merero e kaholimo ho R40,000 kapa e nkang matsatsi a fetang 180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Aterese tsa setša tse hlakileng li thusa litšebeletso tsa tšohanyetso ho u fumana kapele—u se ke ua lumella phoso ea ho ngola e sitise thuso!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_6.description: Molao oa Kaho 9: Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi le ho Hlahloba Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokhoa o khethehileng e hlokahala bakeng sa mesebetsi eohle.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Ho tseba mesebetsi ea kotsi kapele ho ka fokotsa kotsi ka 25%—e joaloka ho fa morero oa hau matla a polokeho!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_7.description: Melao ea SACPCMP: CHSO le PrCHSA ba tlameha ho boloka ngoliso le litlhoko tsa CPD ho netefatsa ho latela molao.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Setsebi se ngolisitsoeng sa SACPCMP se ka fokotsa kotsi ea molao haholo—MVP ea polokeho ea morero oa hau!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_8.description: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(l): Bareki ba tlameha ho amohela moralo oa H&S oa mokonteraka pele mosebetsi o qala.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Boikarabello bo hlakileng litokomaneng bo ka eketsa ponaletso ea morero—motho e mong le e mong o tseba karolo ea hae!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_9.description: Molao oa Bophelo le Polokeho Mosebetsing: Litokomane tse nepahetseng li netefatsa ho latela molao le ho sireletsa bohle ba amehang.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Ntlha ea Boqapi: Selikalikoe sa hau ke sesebelisoa sa hau sa polokeho—tokomane e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe eo u e kenyang e etsa hore morero oa hau o sebetse ka polokeho!
training.title: Koetliso e Felletseng ea Sebaka sa Mosebetsi
training.description: Hlahloba mananeo a rona a koetliso a sebaka sa mosebetsi a felletseng ho netefatsa ho latela melao ea OHS ea Afrika Boroa le ho khothaletsa tikoloho ea mosebetsi e bolokehileng. Khetha koetliso ka matsoho, ka sehlopha, kapa sebelisa sethusi sa rona ho fumana likhothaletso tse ikhethileng tse thehiloeng indastering ea hau, bamameli ba khethiloeng, le sebaka.
training.action_buttons.view_manual: Reka Bukana ea Koetliso e ka Fetolehang

training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Temo ea SafetyHelp: Lisebelisoa tsa koetliso tse fanoeng ke tsa tlhaiso-leseling feela 'me ha li fane ka likeletso tsa setsebi. Ho fumana litharollo tsa OHS tse ikhethileng, ikopanye le SafetyHelp ho support@safetyhelp.co.za kapa etela Leqephe la ho Ikopanya.
training.checkout.success: Ho lefa ho atlehile! Lisebelisoa tsa hau tsa koetliso li hlahisitsoe. Khoasolla PDF tsa hau ka tlase. Bakeng sa koetliso ea inthaneteng, likhoutu tsa ho kena li rometsoe ho uena ka emeile.
training.checkout.online_codes: Likhoutu tsa ho Kena Koetliso ea Inthaneteng:
training.providers.title: Bafani ba Koetliso ba Amoheloang
training.providers.description: Na u hloka koetliso ea motho ka motho? Ikopanye le bafani ba koetliso ba amoheloang bakeng sa litlhoko tsa hau.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - E Amohetsoe ke SETA - E Ikhethile ho Thuso ea Pele, Ho Tima Mollo - Kopano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - E Ngolisitsoe ho SACPCMP - E Ikhethile ho Polokeho ea Kaho - Kopano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Koetliso e Felletseng ea OHS - Kopano: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Reka Bukana ea Koetliso e ka Fetolehang
training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana bukana ea koetliso e felletseng e lokiselitsoeng k'hamphani ea hau, e kenyelletsang litlhoko tsa molao, litaba tse khethehileng tsa k'hamphani tse thehiloeng ho profaele ea hau ea kotsi, le litheko tse tsoang ho bafani ba koetliso ba amoheloang.

training.manual.risk_profile.error: Ka kopo khetha profaele ea kotsi.

training.legal_fact.step_1: Ntlha ea Molao: Molao oa OHS Karolo ea 8 o hloka hore bahiri ba fane ka koetliso e lokiselitsoeng likotsi tse khethehileng tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Ntlha ea Boqapi: Na u tseba hore koetliso ea kamehla e ka fokotsa liketsahalo mosebetsing ka ho fihla ho 30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Ntlha ea Molao: Bomasepala ba lehae ba ka ba le melao ea OHS e khethehileng e fapaneng e amang litlhoko tsa koetliso.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Ntlha ea Boqapi: Libaka tsa mosebetsi tse nang le kotsi e phahameng joalo ka libaka tsa kaho li hloka koetliso e khafetsa ho boloka maemo a polokeho.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Ntlha ea Molao: Molao oa OHS o laela koetliso ea maemo a khethehileng joalo ka baemeli ba SHE ho netefatsa ho latela molao.
